title: Krzysztof Nowak
text:
For the past few years, I have been supporting finance professionals by providing automation solutions for their data workflows. My primary focus has been on the Alteryx platform, Power BI, and the R programming language.

Currently, I work as an Alteryx Consultant at Data Pal, an Official Alteryx Partner offering specialized Alteryx consulting and training services. We specialize in data analysis, digital transformation, and delivering solutions within the Alteryx platform, where we assist other businesses in automating their processes.

In 2024, I started a postgraduate program in Machine Learning at the University of Economics in Katowice, Poland, to expand my skills in data science and AI.

What I focus on?
✔ Data Automation & Workflow Optimization
✔ Alteryx & Power BI for Finance & Business Intelligence
✔ Machine Learning & Data Analysis
✔ Business Process Improvement

title: Tech Stack
text:
I’ve worked with many tools over the course of my several-year career, but two have made a particular mark on my professional experience and education: Alteryx and the R language.

AlteryxR


Alteryx is low code platform designed to perform ETL process. It is an extremely effective tool to streamline corporate processes involving the processing of large amounts of complex data.


R is programming languages designed for statistics and graphics.
However, it has evolved considerably in recent years, mainly due to the Tidyverse ecosystem which also makes it a powerful tool in the area of Business Intelligence or Data Engineering.
